definitions.definition: A short haircut in which the hair is brushed straight up then cut flat across the top.

A type of stringed instrument, most often an acoustic guitar , with a flat top (as opposed to an archtop ), with strings held in place with pins, and with a complex system of bracing struts on the top.
A grill with a flat cooking surface rather than metal bars .

main_definition: ( US ) A short haircut in which the hair is brushed straight up then cut flat across the top.
secondary_definitions: ( US , navy , informal ) An aircraft carrier . [from 1942]

( music ) A type of stringed instrument, most often an acoustic guitar , with a flat top (as opposed to an archtop ), with strings held in place with pins, and with a complex system of bracing struts on the top.
( cooking ) A grill with a flat cooking surface rather than metal bars .
